Welcome to thrush
=================

Welcome to thrush's documentation. It's a modern and simple
to use wrapper to RRDTool_. Get started by heading over
to :ref:`installation` and then to the :ref:`quickstart`
documentation. If you need more in depth information of 
thrush, check out the :ref:`api` documentation.

.. _RRDTool: http://oss.oetiker.ch/rrdtool/

User's Guide
------------

    user
